chunk:
Category: Mask

Ingredients: Bentonite Clay, Montmorillonite (French Green) Clay, Ascophyllum Nodosum (Kelp) Powder, *Arthrospira Platensis (Spirulina) Powder, Dead Sea Mud, Taraxacum Officinale (Dandelion) Leaf Powder, *Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil *Organic Ingredient/Ingrédient Biologique
book: 2841-withSimplicity Renew & Retain   Spirulina & Kelp Correcting Mask

chunk:
Directions: Mix 1 part powder & 1 part water. Apply to skin and keep on for 12-15 minutes.* Wash off with warm water and mask sponge. *For sensitive skin, reduce time.

Warnings: none

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
